name: Transit Terror
description:
Balance resources between your 20 survivors as you try to get your bus as far as you can, balancing fuel, food and supplies and making tough and sometimes morally-questionable desisions to ensure your survival. Upgrade your bus and keep your party armed and equiped to ensure combat effectiveness against raiders and zombie hordes. Face infectious imposters and low morale in this unfairness simulator.

How far can you make it?

WARNING: Playing in a setting lower than medium can cause gameplay to break. Play in ultra to avoid this issue. The game is sprites so graphical settings shouldn't be a problem and performance issues wont be present.
